name: V for Virus
description:
In a world ruled by machines, you're hosting a living organism, one of the "Human Machine" which now populate the world.

What if you used this opportunity to bring some REVOLUTION to this non-changing et insipid society ?

But please take care to not let the virus possess you, or at least, not entirely ...

W A S D : Movement, Choose in menu
Shot : Space Bar : Shot, Select in menu

Quentin Lacourt : main menu music, pixel art

Hugo Bombail : pixel art, programming

Jean Claisse : programming, musics in game

A game made in 72 hours with Unity3D

FafaStudio's Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/fafastud/?fref=ts
